resources.string:
Dear users, welcome to wanandroid， Dear users, welcome to. We know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect your personal information and privacy in accordance with laws and regulations。
 1、In order for you to use Wan Android safely, we will want you to collect device information；
 2、Without your consent, we will not obtain pier number sharing or provide your information from a third party；
 3、You can access, correct and delete your personal information. We will also provide cancellation and complaint methods；
 4、If you agree, please click the button below to receive our service。
You can read the full user agreement and privacy policy for details
